::Rust::

Stumbling out of the bushes, Rust groans, rubbing his head. Taking a 
few more steps forward, he tripps over Whistler, falling to the 
ground. He gets up, looking back at Whistler.

"Are you allright, Soldier??" he asks loudly, forgetting about 
Whistler's rank.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> OOC: Since no one knows what happened to him he got blown out of 
the way by 
> some explosion in the battle at the Arc.
> 
> ::Whistler::
>     He woke up wondering what truck hit him, when he realized it 
was some 
> annoying flying horse guy.  The next thing he wonders is how long 
he was out. 
>  He slowly stands up and staggers over to the Arc to see what's 
going on.  
> Halfway there he collapses on the ground in near agony.  In 
desperate hope he 
> screams "HELP ME.  ANYONE"
